pages.text: When long expeditions have you gathering vast amounts of resources, one extra slot can have a large impact. $(thing)Leather Satchels$() are similar to $(l:getting_started/pottery#vessel)Small Vessels$(), but have an additional slot. Contrarily, satchels don't have the means to melt ores nor do they preserve food as efficiently.
$(thing)Leather Satchels$() are crafted with two $(thing)Satchel Parts$(), which are knapped from leather.
